page.title: 14HOUSING IN TILSTON
page.content: Most of the housing in our area are found in the village of Tilston or around Carden Green. There are three small estates; Inveresk Road, Rookery Road and Grafton Park. Rookery Road is council property but the majority of housing in our area is privately owned. The size of property ranges from small cottages to large mansions. The larger property is the older property and some date back to Elizabethan times. There are many large farm houses in our area and they mostly date back to the 19th century. Many of the older people live in bungalows. Most people look after their houses and we have no neglected property in our area. This is an area where people desire to live. The terrace houses are pre-war. Many of the large houses are set in beautiful gardens.
